overview: The breath-taking yet cold mountain landscapes of Lika shown in this poetic documentary intimate oneâ€™s state of mind, inner struggles and revelations. While Zrinka films the spectacular and cruel sights of the region, that very same Lika paints the contours of the director herself, as she revisits experiences of her ancestors and her own experiences in a search for the key for accepting her epilepsy and overcoming previous losses.
title: A Two Way Mirror
